thread.title: iWin, Inc. to acquire ArcadeTown.com
thread.title_full: iWin, Inc. to acquire ArcadeTown.com - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: iWin, Inc. to acquire ArcadeTown.com
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE iWin, Inc.
SAN FRANCISCO , Oct. 1, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- iWin, Inc. today announced it has acquired ArcadeTown.com. ArcadeTown has been a popular casual game site for over a decade offering players free web games and PC downloadable games. ArcadeTown entertains close to 500,000 monthly unique gamers that are attracted to the site to engage in the site's vast library of over 1,000 games.
As a leading distributor and publisher of family-friendly games, iWin continues to look for unique opportunities to expand its reach of casual gamers. The acquisition of the ArcadeTown.com represents iWin's fourth acquisition in the last two years and expands iWin's monthly uniques to over 5mm. iWin has created a full service game offering that includes over 300 cross-platform HTML5 games and in excess of 2,000 PC downloadable games which will enable iWin to expand on the current game portfolio presented at ArcadeTown.com.
"ArcadeTown.com has been a marquee property within the casual gaming universe as it has brought a deep and diversified mix of games to market," said CJ Wolf, CEO of iWin. "ArcadeTown.com has established a passionate and loyal user base and iWin is excited to be able to continue the long tradition of entertaining these players."
About iWin, Inc.
iWin is an innovative, cross platform publisher and distributor of casual games for the mass market. As a game publisher, iWin has created award winning games including Jewel Quest , Bubble Town and Jewel Quest Mysteries, as well as licensed IP like Deal or No Deal and 1 vs 100. As a game distributor, iWin provides a full suite of gaming solutions to Pogo, Yahoo, MSN, and AT&T. iWin also owns direct to consumer sites including iWin.com, Iplay.com, Download-Free-Games.com and JenkatGames.com
CONTACT: CJ Wolf, 415-378-3050, cj@iwin.com
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/iwin-inc-to-acquire-arcadetowncom-300152410.html
